definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Among other sports that originate in Persia are polo and jousting.
sentences.chinese: 起源於波斯的其他體育項目還有馬球和馬上槍術。

sentences.english: It is an area the HPA is now looking at closely.
sentences.chinese: 這是英國馬球總會目前密切關注的領域。

sentences.english: Victory horse polo game V. H. P.
sentences.chinese: G全稱的含義是成功的馬球運動。

sentences.english: He can play polo very well.
A long - handled implement used to strike a ball , as in croquet and polo.
sentences.chinese: 球棍一種用於擊球的長手柄器具，如在槌球和馬球中。

sentences.english: A small luxury 'life-style' exhibition center is being created adjacent to the polo tournament venue.
sentences.chinese: 在馬球比賽場地邊將會設置“時尚奢侈生活展”區域。

sentences.english: Horseplay is OK at work as long as are off the clock.
sentences.chinese: 馬球是隻要你的工作確定的關閉時鐘。

sentences.english: Kate watches William play at Cirencester Park Polo Club.
sentences.chinese: 在賽倫塞斯特公園馬球俱樂部，凱特在看威廉玩馬球。

sentences.english: Kate watches William play at Cirencester Park Polo Club.
sentences.chinese: 在賽倫塞斯特公園馬球俱樂部，凱特在看威廉玩馬球。

sentences.english: We have not played polo for a while. Let us have a big match, you and I.
sentences.chinese: 許久沒打馬球了，朕要和皇后大戰一場。

sentences.english: Polo seems very difficult to learn.
And then there is a series of, the asset of every ball game and across in polo.
sentences.chinese: 還有一系列的，球類運動和馬球的優點。

sentences.english: He has both the time and the money to play polo.
sentences.chinese: 他有時間也有錢去打馬球。

definition: football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
to become caught up in an irresolvable situation (idiom)
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
